text: National Chung Cheng University (CCU) is a university in Taiwan. It was named after Chiang Kai-Shek (Wade-Giles: Chiang Chung-cheng). The main campus is in Chiayi. It was founded in 1989. CCU is among the four universities of the Taiwan Comprehensive University System. ==Other websites== *CCU C Category:1989 establishments in Taiwan
title: National Chung Cheng University
